mapper.select: SELECT WO.WOGROUPWA, WO.TASKIDWA, WO.DESCRIPTIONWA, WO.PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, WO.ESTADOWA, WO.WOPRIORITYWA, WO.ACTSTARTWA, WO.CHANGEBYWA, WO.CINUM, WO.SERVICELINE, WO.OWNERWA, WO.OWNERGROUPWA, WO.REPORTDATEWA, WO.REPORTEDBYWA, WO.STATUSDATEWA, WO.WOCLASSWA, WO.JPNUM, WO.JPDESCRIPTION, WO.WOACTUALFIN, WO.ACTFINISH, WO.WONUMWA, WO.HABPUESTOTRABAJO, WO.WO_ACTA FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WO WHERE (WO.PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE (SELECT P.PLUSCUSTOMER FROM SMARTDESK.PROYECTO P WHERE P.IDPROYECTO = #{idproyecto}) ) AND WO.WOCLASSWA IN ('ACTIVITY','WORKORDER') AND WO.WOGROUPWA NOT LIKE 'CH%' AND WO.ESTADOWA IN ('COMP','NOTREQ') AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WO.WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) ORDER BY WO.ACTFINISH
SELECT WONUMWA FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE WONUMWA = #{wonumwa}

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (UPPER(JPDESCRIPTION) IN (UPPER('Alta personal Rimac') , UPPER('Alta personal Externo'))) AND (OWNERGROUPWA IN ('I-DCS-PE-VIR10-RIMAC-OSNR','I-DCS-PE-VIR10-RIMAC-OSRT','I-DCS-PE-VIR10-RIMAC-VIP','I-DCS-PE-VIR10-RIMAC-OSPRV' )) AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%ENTREGA%') AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaFin} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND (HABPUESTOTRABAJO IS NULL)

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (UPPER(JPDESCRIPTION) LIKE (UPPER('%Alta personal%'))) AND (OWNERGROUPWA IN (#{idgruporesolutor},#{idgruporesolutorVip})) AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%ENTREGA%') AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaFin} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer} AND (HABPUESTOTRABAJO IS NOT NULL)

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND OWNERGROUPWA NOT LIKE '%OSPRV') AND ((UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'ENTREGA%') AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE '%RECUPERA%') AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'CARGA DE%')) AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer}

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND OWNERGROUPWA LIKE '%OSPRV') AND ((UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'ENTREGA%') AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE '%RECUPERA%') AND (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'CARGA DE%')) AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer}

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND OWNERGROUPWA NOT LIKE '%OSPRV') AND ((UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE 'ENTREGA%') OR (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%RECUPERA%')) AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer}

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND (OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND OWNERGROUPWA LIKE '%OSPRV') AND ((UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE 'ENTREGA%') OR (UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%RECUPERA%')) AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer}

SELECT WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA, HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER WHERE ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND ((UPPER(DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%VDI%')) AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer}

SELECT A.WOGROUPWA, A.TASKIDWA, A.DESCRIPTIONWA, A.PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, A.ESTADOWA, A.WOPRIORITYWA, A.ACTSTARTWA, A.CHANGEBYWA, A.CINUM, A.SERVICELINE, A.OWNERWA, A.OWNERGROUPWA, A.REPORTDATEWA, A.REPORTEDBYWA, A.STATUSDATEWA, A.WOCLASSWA, A.JPNUM, A.JPDESCRIPTION, A.WOACTUALFIN, A.ACTFINISH, A.WONUMWA, A.HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER A WHERE A.ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND A.PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer} AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(A.WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND (A.OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%') AND (UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%ACTA%')
AND (A.WO_ACTA LIKE 'APLICA')

SELECT A.WOGROUPWA, A.TASKIDWA, A.DESCRIPTIONWA, A.PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, A.ESTADOWA, A.WOPRIORITYWA, A.ACTSTARTWA, A.CHANGEBYWA, A.CINUM, A.SERVICELINE, A.OWNERWA, A.OWNERGROUPWA, A.REPORTDATEWA, A.REPORTEDBYWA, A.STATUSDATEWA, A.WOCLASSWA, A.JPNUM, A.JPDESCRIPTION, A.WOACTUALFIN, A.ACTFINISH, A.WONUMWA, A.HABPUESTOTRABAJO FROM SMARTDESK.WORKORDER A WHERE A.ESTADOWA LIKE 'COMP' AND PLUSPCUSTOMERWA LIKE #{pluscustomer} AND (CAST (VARCHAR_FORMAT(WOACTUALFIN,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER) = CAST(VARCHAR_FORMAT(#{fechaInicio} ,'MMYYYY') AS INTEGER)) AND (A.OWNERGROUPWA LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND A.OWNERGROUPWA NOT LIKE '%OSPRV') AND (UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE '%ACTA%') AND ((UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'RECUPERA%' AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'ENTREGA%' AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'INSTALAC%') OR (UPPER(A.JPDESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('Actividades de Mudanza en la sede') AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) LIKE 'DESCONEX%') OR (UPPER(A.JPDESCRIPTION) NOT LIKE UPPER('Actividades de Mudanza en la sede') AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'CONEXIÃ“N%') OR (UPPER(A.JPDESCRIPTION) NOT LIKE UPPER('Actividades de Mudanza entre sedes') AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'DESCONEX%') OR (UPPER(A.JPDESCRIPTION) NOT LIKE UPPER('Actividades de Mudanza entre sedes') AND UPPER(A.DESCRIPTIONWA) NOT LIKE 'CONEXIÃ“N%') ) AND (A.WO_ACTA IS NULL OR A.WO_ACTA NOT LIKE 'APLICA')

SELECT WA.WOGROUP AS WOGROUPWA, WA.TASKID AS TASKIDWA, WA.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTIONWA, WA.OWNER AS OWNERWA, WA.OWNERGROUP AS OWNERGROUPWA, WA.STATUS AS ESTADOWA FROM MAXIMO.WOACTIVITY WA WHERE WA.WOGROUP LIKE #{wogroupwa} AND WA.OWNERGROUP LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%' AND WA.OWNERGROUP NOT LIKE '%OSPRV' AND WA.TASKID = (SELECT W.TASKID FROM MAXIMO.WOACTIVITY W WHERE (W.WOGROUP LIKE WA.WOGROUP) AND (UPPER(W.DESCRIPTION) LIKE 'ENTREGA%' OR UPPER(W.DESCRIPTION) LIKE 'RECUPERA%') AND (W.OWNERGROUP LIKE 'I-DCS-PE-%') AND (W.STATUS LIKE 'NOTREQ') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY)
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SMARTDESK.WORKORDER ( WOGROUPWA, TASKIDWA, DESCRIPTIONWA, PLUSPCUSTOMERWA, ESTADOWA, WOPRIORITYWA, ACTSTARTWA, CHANGEBYWA, CINUM, SERVICELINE, OWNERWA, OWNERGROUPWA, REPORTDATEWA, REPORTEDBYWA, STATUSDATEWA, WOCLASSWA, JPNUM, JPDESCRIPTION, WOACTUALFIN, ACTFINISH, WONUMWA )
VALUES
(#{wogroupwa}, #{taskidwa}, #{descriptionwa}, #{pluspcustomerwa}, #{estadowa}, #{woprioritywa}, #{actstartwa}, #{changebywa}, #{cinum}, #{serviceline}, #{ownerwa}, #{ownergroupwa}, #{reportdatewa}, #{reportedbywa}, #{statusdatewa}, #{woclasswa}, #{jpnum}, #{jpdescription}, #{woactualfin}, #{actfinish}, #{wonumwa} )
